_xResult.title: Master of Art Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made modern long jacket in textured linen
_xResult.longdesc:
You can only find styles like Aiste's custom linen treasures in high end boutiques - but those aren't made to measure, so why buy them there? You can import your own European style made exactly to your specifications, all the way from Lithuania. 

 

What's special about this design is the option to have a contrasting color in the jacket in the stitching and in the collar.  Choose the version shown here (black/brown with harvest orange) or make your own combo.  Dramatic modern angles and collar, string tie closures. Wear it with the matching trousers or any skirt or pants. 

 


Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment."

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold, dry flat. Dry clean ok.
